name: Festive Digestive
description:
'Twas a starry Christmas eve, Santa was delivering presents to all the good children of the world, when HE IS ATTACKED BY AN ELDRITCH MONSTER!
can Santa stop the monster stealing too many presents?
can the Monster steal too many presents?
find a friend or foe to play with, and find out!

Gameplay

Each game has two rounds, in the first round team 1 plays Santa and team 2 plays the Monster, after 2 minutes, the teams swap who they are controlling, after another 2 minutes, the game ends and whichever team got the most points wins.

As the Monster, a teams goal is to collect as many presents as possible to get points, the more presents grabbed at once, the more points they gain

As Santa, your goal is to stop the Monster grabbing presents by exploding them, you cannot get any points as Santa, only stop the monster

Controls

Although this game does feature configurable controls (a netal first!) , the defaults may as well be listed:

  • A / D : team 1 turn left/right
  • W / S : team 1 special
  • Left / Right arrow : team 2 turn left/right
  • Up / Down arrow : team 2 special
  • Esc : pause game
  • Enter : continue to next round

Italics = configurable
